app.description: This is a basic example of a React application using Typescript. You can add your email to the list filling the form below.

login.signup: Don't have an account? Sign Up
signup.name: Username
signup.sucess: ¡Success! you are already registered in DeDesktop
crud.name: Name
home.p1: DeDesktop is the result of the effort and dedication of the es3c group of the Software Architecture subject.
home.p2: DeDesktop is a software store built on React and Node.js. In it we have the same options as in a conventional store, such as registering, seeing the product catalog or making a purchase
home.p3: The novelty comes in how we treat our clients' data. To avoid data decentralization as much as possible, we are using a technology called Solid. With it, we can let the client be responsible for their own data. Thus, we only have information related to your account, such as your username or the orders you have made.
home.p4: With this project we intend to make people (and our teachers) aware of the viability of a new system like Solid, in addition to improving it with the use of React and Node technologies.
home.catalog: See all our products in our catalog
